pageProduct.name: Alkira Detoxifying Mineral Radiance Facial Masque 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Australian Clays + Natural Fruit AHAs + Bioactive Natives + Radiance Enhancing Botanicals. A multifunctional radiance enhancing, detoxifying, super-hydrating, barrier repairing and moisture regulating facial masque that will change the way you think about masking

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Natural fruit enzymes of Pineapple and Papaya to resurface and refine skin’s texture, visibly reducing the appearance of blemishes • Australian clays for a deep clean and to minimise pores • Enriched with a radiance enhancing Australian native vitamin C complex of Kakadu Plum, Quandong and Finger Lime Caviar • Enriched with Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate – a water soluble vitamin C to encourage radiance • A hydrating complex of Avocado, Sunflower, Mango and Aloe Vera

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Kaolin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Bentonite, Palmitic Acid, Ceteareth-20, Stearic Acid Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Helianthus Annuus Hybrid (Sunflower) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Terminalia Ferdinandiana (Kakadu Plum) Fruit Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Davidsonia Jerseyana (Davidson Plum) Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Quartz, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499) *Allergens

Directions

Apply to damp face and neck. Relax and allow to penetrate for 15 minutes. Rinse off with warm water and wash cloth
